content: wrap and turn row 2 p to 1 st before next m wrap and turn row 3 k to 1 st before wrap wrap and turn row 4 p to 1 st before wrap wrap and turn repeat last 2 row 9 more times until 14 sts are between wraps or whatever fits you best next row k to first wrapped st pick up wrap and knit it decrease with st wrap next st should now have 2 wraps on it and turn next row p to first wrapped st pick up wrap and purl it decrease with st wrap next st should also now have 2 wraps on it and turn continue picking up wraps wrapping and tunring until yarn is at the beginning of the round there should still be one wrapped st on the right side of the heel its wraps will be picked up and knitted on the next round to avoid holes cuff set-up round 1 work in pattern to first m k to end of round making sure to pick up wraps on the first st after m and k them decrease with st round 2 k to m k2 k2tog 9 times 50 sts cuff round 1 *yo ssk repeat from * to end of round round 2 k all sts round 3 *k2tog yo repeat from * to end of round round 4 k all sts repeat last 4 row as many times as you like or have yarn for bobble after round 2 or 4 to bind off cut yarn leaving a tail about three times the circumference of the edge of sts you want to bind off thread tail on tapestry needle and enter first 2 sts on left-hand needle purlwise pull tail through and enter first st on left-hand needle knitwise pulling tail through and dropping that st off the needle repeat until all sts are bound off secure ends block abbreviations and techniques bobble bind off co cast on dpns double-pointed needles k knit k2tog with yarn in back insert needle knitwise into first two sts on left needle knit them together m marker p purl pm place marker round round ssk with yarn in back slip knitwise first two stitches from let needle to right needle one at a time slip them back to left needle and knit them together through the back loop st s stitch es wrap and turn take yarn to opposite side of work if in back bring forward and vice versa slip first st on left-hand needle purlwise to right-hand needle bring yarn back to original side of work return st to left-hand needle and turn work so the
